info.title: API Evangelist - Products API
info.description: This is a template product API from API Evangelist.

get.summary: Finds all business
get.description: Returns a list of all business, allowing you to filter by state and keyword query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: a text query to search across facilities

get.summary: Retrieve a business using its ID
get.description: Returns a business detail

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id for the business, notice this is in the path, not a query variable

get.summary: Pulls a listing of events
get.description: Returns a list of events, allowing you to filter by keyword query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: a text query to search across events

get.summary: Retrieve an event using its ID
get.description: Returns a events detail

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id for the event, notice this is in the path, not a query variable

get.summary: Checks To See If There Are Tables On Web Page
get.description: Turns a listing of the number of tables, and number of rows for tables in an HTML web page

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: the url of html page to evaluate

get.summary: Return URLs
get.description: Returns a list of any url present in an HTML web page.

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: any file extension, separated by commas

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: the url of html page to evaluate

get.summary: Retrieve an image using its ID
get.description: Returns a images detail

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id for the job, notice this is in the path, not a query variable
